page.title: 12Leisure and Recreation-Sport
page.content: In Cookridge we have good sporting facilities because we have a sports centre which is used by many people. In the sports centre there is an indoor swimming pool and badminton and squash courts. There are facilities for table tennis, gymnastics, keep fit and basket ball. We have other sports facilities outside like a cricket field, rugby and football pitches and some tennis courts. Cookridge has a cricket team which plays in a local league. There is a play area with swings and slides for small children. Keep fit and yoga classes are held in the Village Hall, the sports centre and in the schools in the evening. We found that a lot of people like to take part in sport because they have to travel to work by bus or car and have jobs where many are sitting down. Sport helps them to keep fit.
